title: Windows 8.1 X64 9in1 OEM ESD en-US July 2015 {Generation2}
description:
* Windows 8.1 X64 9in1 OEM ESD en-US July 2015 {Generation2}


[ RELEASE INFO ]


* File: W81.X64.OEM.ESD.en-US.July2015.iso

* Sources: dvd-6051480 & 6054382

* Size: 4,79GB
* Format: Bootable ISO

* CRC32: ee66a8c7
* MD5: 8adf365f476e22745b8f5eac7d56e495
* SHA-1: 9dac947434406e0d17577b3ceca7346171add340

* Language: en-US [ English - USA ]

[ CONTENTS ]

* Integrated / Pre-installed in Audit Mode:

* .NET Framework 2.0, 3.0 & 3.5
* .NET Framework 4.6 (KB3045557)
* Important & Security Updates - 2015-07-14
* Defender Updates

[ FEATURES ]

* Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset 8.1 (Microsoft DaRT)
* install.wim compressed to recovery format (install.esd)

[ EDITIONS INCLUDED ]

* Windows 8.1 Core
* Windows 8.1 Core		Pre-Activated
* Windows 8.1 Core		OEM-Activated

* Windows 8.1 Pro
* Windows 8.1 Pro		Pre-Activated
* Windows 8.1 Pro		OEM-Activated

* Windows 8.1 Enterprise
* Windows 8.1 Enterprise	Pre-Activated
* Windows 8.1 Enterprise	OEM-Activated


[ COMMENTS & ACTIVATION INFO ]

* Activator: KMSpico v10.0.4 Portable Edition.
 ( Potential False Positive Virus Alarm )

[ INSTALLATION & INFORMATION ]

* No upgrades, only clean installs.
* Create bootable USB (highly recommended) with Rufus,
* (attached) or burn to DVD at slow speed.

* Credits:
* milrob and stevie-boy for continued support and help with user questions.

* Hope you will enjoy this release!

* Regards,
* Generation2 @ KAT & TPB
